Text: All of these songs have nothing to do with that impostor who calls himself a musician and who doesn't know the first thing about the Irish music. This is just a collection (a bad one) of genuine celtic songs performed by real celtic music artists. I could make a thousand of such "albums" way much better than this one. If you want to listen a good celtic music collection, choose the real deal, the ones made by the pros, like Shanachie, Green Linnet, Narada, Putumayo or other Record Companies.
